item.title: Use KNP as a Universal Dependency parser in spaCy
item.description: The other day, we released spaCy plugin [Camphr version 0.5.20](https://github.com/PKSHATechnology-Research/camphr/releases/tag/0.5.20). The feature of this time is [universal dependency] from the analysis result of KNPimplementedbyProfessorKoichiYasuokaofKyotoUniversity.Itisafunctiontooutputthelabelof(https://universaldependencies.org/). In this article, I will briefly introduce how to use it. Install Install knponthesystemorKNPdockerimage $ pip install camphr[juman] #Analysis import camphr import spacy nlp = camphr.load("knp") doc = nlp ("Taro went to Mt. Fuji while eating an apple and a mandarin orange.") spacy.displacy.render(doc) “Apple” and “Mikan” are connected by conj(conjunct), which is a wonderful analysis result.
